content.description: This route is a variation on Chubby Fairy (V4). Start on crimps up and right from the original start, then traverse left to the big sloping edge to finish on the original route.
content.location: See Chubby Fairy directions. scramble up to the obvious roof on the left edgeÂ of the fern gully area.

content.description:
Guidebook says start in the roof with the triangular horn and make some big moves up and to the left to a hard top-out

.

I say bump left first, pop a heel in the crack, then make some smaller moves to the top. Terrible landing
content.protection: 3+ pads and a spotter if you like to burl
content.location: From the trail, as soon as you come to a boulder on your left side, cut left and get over the big log. Then walk up to the small passageway created by the previous boulder and another boulder. Hop down, turn around, and wallah-you're in a cave with Chubby Fairy straight in your face. Alternatively, walk past the first boulder, cut left, and then struggle with getting your stack of pads through the stepped opening
